column1: Thank you to the hundreds and hundreds of supporters who put my sign in their yards. As a good conservative please save it for next election. Many thanks again. https://t.co/QB2orZLkrI
I’d like to thank my constituents for providing me the opportunity to be their advocate in Congress and I remain committed to serving every person who calls Ohio’s Fifth Congressional District home.

The residents of NW and West Central OH have shared with me what is most important to them since I was first elected in 2007. They are the reason why I am able to work on their behalf in Congress to find solutions to their most pressing challenges through casework or legislation.
It is an honor and privilege to have the trust of the people in Ohio’s Fifth Congressional District to represent and serve them in the U.S. House of Representatives.
The polls are open for another hour and a half until 7:30pm. If you haven’t already voted be sure to cast your vote in support of the GOP ticket before the polls close! #ElectionDay

Tomorrow is #ElectionDay.   If you didn’t get a chance to send in your absentee ballot through the mail be sure to drop it off in person tomorrow by 7:30pm.   Voting in person tomorrow? Find your polling location here: https://t.co/2XZlbmtQGi https://t.co/qGviVjkpyy

Election Day is TOMORROW! Be sure to get your absentee ballot in the mail today to ensure your vote is counted! All mailed absentee ballots must be postmarked by today OR you can drop your absentee ballot off at your county board of elections office until 7:30pm tomorrow 11/3.

Bishop Thomas in @toledonews "Life Hangs in the Balance."  I'm proud of my pro-life record + my endorsement from a number of pro-life groups including @nrlc @ohiolife Greater Toledo Right to Life and Right to Life Action Coalition of Ohio.  #votelife  https://t.co/7D63hZVQPG
Finally let’s talk about one of the most important concerns in this region — energy. Under Mr. Trump the United States achieved energy independence for the first time in the lifetimes of most of us.

He also kept his promise to appoint originalists to the Supreme Court of the US. His 3rd appointment Amy Coney Barrett is the best of all - a jurist whose mind and character and scholarship ARE first-class. We hope she stands against both judicial and executive excess.
From the endorsement: "Under Donald Trump the economy pre-Covid boomed like no time since the 1950s. Look at your 401(k) over the past three years."
The @toledonews hasn't endorsed a Republican for President in more than 3 decades but they are endorsing President Trump! https://t.co/adYxPbOeji

A chilly morning but a great crowd in Lucas County for President Trump and the #GOP ticket.  Remember to support Kennedy and French for the Ohio Supreme Court. #ElectionDay is 2 days away! https://t.co/KFzEW9QVNK

Election Day is in ONE WEEK!   If you received a mail-in ballot make sure it is completed & postmarked no later than November 2nd.   Haven’t voted yet but want to vote in person? Make a plan to do so & encourage others to do the same.
Did you receive a mail-in ballot? Election Day is right around the corner. Make sure you send them back ASAP to ensure your vote is counted!

Addressed the crowd the afternoon ahead of @VP Mike Pence. He was in #LucasCounty to rally support for the GOP ticket.  Remember to vote as soon as you’re able. Early voting is available across the 5th Congressional District and this election is going to come down to turnout. https://t.co/qBSzvtFyUY

I'm proud of my record of getting things done for #OH05. I'm in the Top 2% in the House in effectiveness - including passing laws expanding access to broadband combating the opioid epidemic and ensuring veterans can get cancer treatment closer to home. https://t.co/wPG7Tr3A62

Marcia early voted to get her #vote in and so have I.   Either early vote or get your absentee ballot because YOU will make the difference in victory for the Republican ticket as well as for Justices French and Kennedy! https://t.co/f2r35oCnBj

☑️ I just #voted - have you voted yet? I encourage you to vote & get your vote in early if you can. Remember to vote for Justices French and Kennedy for the Ohio Supreme Court. Thanks for your support for our GOP Team!
It was a beautiful day in the great outdoors as I joined my great friend @TimWalberg at his annual hunt. #MI07 https://t.co/PkmM9RMmxe
Thanks to the @HancockCoGOP for the great turnout for President Trump. Remember to vote and bring a friend. https://t.co/w165dPIy6K

Appreciated the opportunity to speak at the Waterville Chamber of Commerce Candidate Night this evening about our efforts to grow the Ohio economy and create #jobs. It’s an honor to serve you in Congress and I humbly ask for your vote in this election. https://t.co/uAuUyRd61q

When voting this year make sure you vote for @KennedyForOhio + @JudgeJudi for the OH Supreme Court. Justice Kennedy + Justice French have done a tremendous job on the court and have earned another term.   If it makes it easier remember K-F-C. Kennedy and French for the Court.

FOUR bills I authored passed the House last week. They would help protect our grid from cyberattacks support American innovation and remove barriers to technological advancement. More here --> https://t.co/p8KQbUBQ7T
Today is the LAST day to register to vote in Ohio for this year's election. Make sure your voice is heard and register at the link below. https://t.co/zqiisg8CYp
Privileged to participate in the BG & Perrysburg #LeagueofWomenVoters Candidate’s Forum this evening at BGSU. https://t.co/Ni4pRUyZEn
The #WoodCountyRepublicans had a great county road rally to kickoff the campaign! https://t.co/8MKn5R07B9

It was great to join so many Ohioans in welcoming President @realDonaldTrump to #OH05 tonight! Our nation is on the road to recovery as we combat #COVID19 get Americans back to work create new jobs & boost our economy. Americans are strong & so is our great country! https://t.co/zMc9q6nIKZ
BREAKING: @realDonaldTrump to speak at the Toledo airport on Monday night. Looking forward to welcoming the President to #OH05.   https://t.co/Df37ixOVse
The #DefianceCounty GOP drive through pork BBQ was a great time and a good place to catch up with so many friends.  It was also a good spot to watch the Trump boat parade. https://t.co/6w74V3lBpO
A huge crowd and signs flying out the door this weekend at the #HenryCountyGOP HQ opening. Great to see @KennedyForOhio and all the other candidates. https://t.co/DBFPXvjKSU
#WilliamsCountyGOP HQ is open in #Bryan. Lots of enthusiasm and signs! https://t.co/Aszrzwb2lp
The #OttawaCountyGOP have opened their HQ in #Genoa. Come over and get a sign. https://t.co/2x9sUXF0CC
Our Latta signs are available at @GopLucas HQs. Thanks to all the great GOP volunteers for all your hard work for our Republican candidates. https://t.co/gQCB7d1WiN

IMPORTANT OHIO VOTING INFO: -Registration Deadline is October 5. -Early Voting Begins on October 6.  -You can request an absentee ballot until Oct 31. -Every county in the state of Ohio will have a dropbox available to drop off your absentee ballot.  -Vote in person on Nov 3.
.@WoodCoGOPParty HQs is open on South Main in Bowling Green. Come by and get some signs! https://t.co/xIIdQZLFTl
Congrats to the #PutnamCountyGOP on the opening of their HQ in Ottawa. Thanks for your great enthusiasm in electing Republicans this November. https://t.co/fYecFGutTh

COVID testing is only helpful if the results are provided a timely manner. I’m pressing to ensure that test results can be provided quickly so that Americans can make the best decisions on how to stay safe. https://t.co/9VBmTahOTA
Be sure to head out and enjoy the #HenryCountyFair! https://t.co/nqzajcqN53

Our first responders put their lives on the line to keep their communities safe. Recently local departments received PPE grants to keep them safe while on the job. I was happy to help this effort to ensure those on the front lines have what they need. https://t.co/GRtzU6w9I0
Joe Biden and Kamala Harris are going in the wrong direction and plan on taking our country with them.

Americans would take home less of their hard-earned paychecks because of higher taxes the role of the federal government would be emboldened consumer choice would be a luxury of the past and socialized health care would be the norm.

Kamala Harris is a leftist who had the most liberal voting record in the Senate. When Joe Biden made the decision to choose Senator Harris as his running mate he made it clear that our country under their liberal agenda would change dramatically.

I lost a great friend with the passing of Ray Hartzell of Hancock County.  I knew Ray my entire life.  He was always there for me. Ray was a Marine in WWII. He was also a great Republican. Marcia and I send our prayers to Betty and his family. https://t.co/slAUkOPbC5
Enjoyed stopping by the #LucasCountyFair last week and delivering a proclamation to the Lucas County Agricultural Society. https://t.co/7dYiRuHttd

Closing the 'Digital Divide' is a focus of mine in Congress. I led a roll out of 26 bills that help ensure families and businesses in would have increased access to high-speed broadband by eliminating burdensome red tape and removing bureaucratic hurdles. https://t.co/vOlzHx0x6x

Honored to receive an A rating from the @NTU based on my record protecting the taxpayer $$ of hardworking Ohioans. Of 435 House members only 48 received an A rating. I believe my constituents know how to spend their money better than the government does. https://t.co/gTAukTJf5g
A wonderful chicken bbq fundraiser to close out the weekend yesterday by the #OttawaCountyGOP Women’s Club https://t.co/PzLaVOmoaP
Congrats to #PutnamCounty and their youth for a great Junior Fair!  #PutnamCounty4H https://t.co/hKwdORvnp3
Congrats to the @HancockCoGOP for opening its HQ. My thanks to the many who came by today. @ohiogop https://t.co/vfPPk20rwW

A few provisions in today's $3 TRILLION liberal wishlist bill:  *Stimulus payments for illegal immigrants *Tax breaks for wealthy residents in Blue States *Blanket release of certain criminals from Federal prisons *A Federal overhaul of state voting systems   I'll be voting NO.

Congrats to @MikeGarcia2020 and @TomTiffanyWI on their special election victories this week. Mike was the first Republican to flip a seat in CA in more than 20 years! Great work by @tomemmer and the @NRCC to build momentum to take back the House in November.
It is my greatest privilege and honor to serve the people of Ohio’s 5th Congressional District. Today is #ElectionDay and I humbly ask for your support.
For more details such as how to get an absentee ballot so you can vote from the safety of your home ➡️ https://t.co/6lJghvZu9Z
To every poll worker and person who worked to make today’s primary possible for the past months weeks and days thank you for your service to our communities.
Today’s primary election has been postponed. We must put our public health and safety above all else in order to mitigate the spread of #COVID19.
Happy to support @theresagavarone! https://t.co/WmAmyPmOvJ
A good read from the House Minority Leader @kevinomccarthy: Thanks to Trump America is Winning Like Never Before   https://t.co/QtKxcwOAVi

On the day of the #SOTU an important reminder that US Economic Confidence is at its highest level in 20 years. With unemployment at record lows and wages on the rise thanks to the leadership of @POTUS and conservative policies - it's no wonder why. https://t.co/RgUxyQOydB
